Package natlang.rdg.lexicalchooser

Class Summary
AdjectiveAdverbPair Pair of an adjective and adverb
BelongToElement Entity that belongs to another entity
CharacterInfo Modelled CharacterInfo
CharacterModel Model of one character, containing the entity, concept, gender, name and properties
ChosenAdjectives Adjectives used in the story sofar
ConceptAdjectivesPair Pair of concept and a vector of adjectives
EntityAdjectivePair Pair of entity and adjective
Entry Entry in the lexicon, containing the concept, root, part of speech, determiner, gender, morphology, preposition, svp and dependency label
Hierarchy Modelling a subsumption hierarchy containg part-of relations (castle/gate), belongto relations (bedroom/princess) and relation relations (father/daughter)
LexicalChooser The module that manages all files in this package
Lexicon The lexicon, mapping concepts to dutch words and containing other linguistic information
PartOfElement Entity that is part of another entity
PossibleAdjectives Lists with concept adjective pairs and adjective adverb pairs that can be used to add adjectives and adverbs
Property A property of a character, consisting of a type and value
RelationElement Entity that is related to another entity by a certain relation (such as father/daughter)
StoryWorld Modelled Story World module
WordCount The number of times a certain word has already been used
WordHistory A list containing all words already used in the story together with the number of times each word has been used
